entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 early this evening then light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
